title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.22 - Placing of posters, stickers and signs on vehicle windows restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.22 - Placing of posters, stickers and signs on vehicle windows restricted

State Regulations

The use or placing of posters, stickers, signs or other
objects on the windshield and/or rear windows of an automotive vehicle or piece
of mobile equipment other than those authorized by the Port Authority is
prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
